amendment.description: To exempt Head Start programs from across the board rescissions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 188 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 188 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To exempt Head Start programs from across the board rescissions.
